name: Buckeye Creek
description:
East side of Whitehorse Mountain. If you want to climb over endless old growth logs while side-hilling, then complete upwards of 20 rappels and downclimbs through log jamsâ€¦this is the canyon for you!

Approach

Pass through the devils club, claw your way up the steep slope, then traverse endless old growth logs while side hilling. Do this for 5 hours.

Descent

Rappel off a tree, then a log, then another log, then another log. Keep doing this until the drops end. Then continue down creek, ducking under fallen logs, climbing over logs through thorns. Then find your way back to the devils club.

Exit

Bushwhack back up to the car. Apologize to the people you invited on this trip.
